original_title: 乱宴の宿 湯けむり未亡人
overview: Komiya is worried that he can't fit into a woman's hole with a big cock. I finally drop the club woman Mai, but when I bet, the things don't fit and I feel depressed. A few days later, he went to the grave of his dead wife and met Kyoko, the widow who runs the inn. Komiya who decided to stay at her inn had a good atmosphere with Nakaumi Mayumi. Kyoko was very curious when she heard the story of Komiya's big cock from Mayumi. Did you get into work and break into Komiya's room? !
title: Yukemuri Widow Ryokan no Yado
